CustomField.formula:
If( Index__c = 'Index1',
IF (Contract__r.Total_TO_Tariff_Nego__c = 0, IF( Value_per__c <>0, Value_per__c/100, Null), YTD_Nego__c/ Contract__r.Total_TO_Tariff_Nego__c),
IF ( Contract__r.Total_TO__c = 0, IF( Value_per__c <>0, Value_per__c/100, Null), YTD_Nego__c / Contract__r.Total_TO__c )
)
CustomField.label: YTD Nego %
